txt.en: While the author of \qThe Book of Nature\q is unknown, it has been suggested that he was acquainted with Radagast the Brown and learned much under his tutelage. Within its pages, the author is said to describe many of the creatures of the natural world and how to befriend them.

You have heard it whispered that the libraries of Moria yet contain many tomes, while many other volumes were brought by the dwarves seeking to reclaim their ancient realm. One such tome in the libraries of the Iron Garrison is said to be the legendary \qThe Book of Nature.\q If you can gain enough favour with the Iron Garrison Guards, they may let you have their copy of this book.
Read the book, \qThe Book of Nature\q
